title: Nuclear map of Australia (Update 2)
brief_description: This interactive informational project researched, designed and coded by Glenn Todd, was inspired and modeled on the poster created by Scott Ludlam and released by ANAWA. It provides a definitive breakdown of the nuclear industry in Australia through text and photographs sourced from www.anawa.org.au, www.sea-us.org.au and the anti-nuclear community.
